intro:
A Mind-Bending Run Action Game
A bizarre game where you control the left hand with your left hand and the right hand with your right hand.
description:
Participation Guide for the Experiment
Thank you for your interest in the hypothesis regarding the symmetry between vision and hand movement.

This experiment aims to measure the ability to transmit information from vision to the brain and from the brain to the hands using a game, and to verify whether this ability improves through repetition.

In the game, you control the left hand with your left hand and the right hand with your right hand to reach the goal.
The hands can change movement direction, jump, and run.
Although it is a simple game, controlling two separate hands independently may cause significant stress for participants.
Please do not force yourself to continue the experiment and take breaks as needed.
